description.value: The fire of your elemental ancestor manifests like dying embers of a blaze, and your inner charcoal helps staunch bleeding, purify simple poisons, and absorb acid. The DC for you to recover from persistent acid, bleed, and poison damage is @Check[type:flat|dc:10]{10} instead of 15 (or @Check[type:flat|dc:5]{5} if you have particularly effective assistance).
